org.nzdis.micro.messaging

Class AbstractCommunicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nzdis.micro.constants.States
      • org.nzdis.micro.constants.AgentStates
        • org.nzdis.micro.messaging.AbstractCommunicator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageCommunicator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractAgent

    public abstract class AbstractCommunicator
extends AgentStates
implements MessageCommunicator
    The AbstractCommunicator augments the generic agent implementation with facilities for asynchronous message passing. All related functionality is provided here.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $ $Date: 2010/11/14 00:00:00 $
    Author:
    Christopher Frantz

      • sendRandomcast

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> sendRandomcast(MicroMessage message,
                                                            int numberOfTargets,
                                                            boolean global,
                                                            boolean trueIndicatesListofCandidatesFalseIndicatesExcludedAgents,
                                                            java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> inOrExclusionList)
        Sends Randomcast to agents which are chosen randomly. If global is set to true, random choice includes all connected remote nodes.
        Parameters:
        message -
        numberOfTargets -
        global -
        trueIndicatesListofCandidatesFalseIndicatesExcludedAgents - Specifies if list is exclusive or excluding (true: exclusive) for random targets
        inOrExclusionList - ArrayList of agents (agent names) to be in/excluded from Randomcast. If null, all platform-registered agents can be potentially selected.
        Returns:
        list of agents that have been chosen for message dispatch

      • sendFuzzycast

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> sendFuzzycast(MicroMessage message,
                                                           java.lang.Float quota,
                                                           boolean global,
                                                           boolean trueIndicatesListofCandidatesFalseIndicatesExcludedAgents,
                                                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> inOrExclusionList)
        Sends Fuzzycast to the specified of agents which are chosen randomly. If global is set to true, random choice includes all connected remote nodes.
        Parameters:
        message -
        numberOfTargets -
        global -
        trueIndicatesListofCandidatesFalseIndicatesExcludedAgents - Specifies if list is exclusive or excluding (true: exclusive) for random targets
        inOrExclusionList - ArrayList of agents (agent names) to be in/excluded from Fuzzycast. If null, all platform-registered agents can be potentially selected.
        Returns:
        list of agents that have been chosen for message dispatch

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> sendFuzzycast(MicroMessage message,
                                                           java.lang.Double quota,
                                                           boolean global,
                                                           boolean trueIndicatesListofCandidatesFalseIndicatesExcludedAgents,
                                                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> inOrExclusionList)
        Sends Fuzzycast to the specified of agents which are chosen randomly. If global is set to true, random choice includes all connected remote nodes.
        Parameters:
        message -
        numberOfTargets -
        global -
        trueIndicatesListofCandidatesFalseIndicatesExcludedAgents - Specifies if list is exclusive or excluding (true: exclusive) for random targets
        inOrExclusionList - ArrayList of agents (agent names) to be in/excluded from Fuzzycast. If null, all platform-registered agents can be potentially selected.
        Returns:
        list of agents that have been chosen for message dispatch

      • sendRolecast

        public void sendRolecast(MicroMessage message,
                         Role role,
                         boolean global)
        Sends message to agents playing a given role. If indicated, dispatches this message globally.
        Parameters:
        message - Message to be sent
        role - Role instance
        global - If set to true, will sent message to connected nodes

      • collectAndPrint

        public void collectAndPrint(java.lang.StringBuffer output,
                            boolean print,
                            boolean reset)
        This function collects console output (and adds a linebreak for each entry) but does not print it unless print is set to true. The collected output is deleted upon printing.
        Parameters:
        output - Message to be collected
        print - Indicates if collected messages are to be printed
        reset - Resets the buffer independent from printing (even if printing is false)

      • clearCollectedOutput

        public void clearCollectedOutput()
        Clears all collected output (collected via collectAndPrint(StringBuffer, boolean, boolean)) without printing it.

        public void print(java.lang.StringBuffer message)
        StringBuffer version of print(String) (faster!) In case of multiple parameters use print(StringBuffer...).
        Parameters:
        message -

      • print

        public void print(java.lang.StringBuffer... message)
        StringBuffer varargs version of print(String) (faster!) Different arguments are concatenated in a lazy fashion.
        Parameters:
        message -

      • print

        public void print(java.lang.String message)
        Console print function providing current agent's name as prefix. Use is discouraged. Use print(StringBuffer) or print(StringBuffer...) in case of multiple String elements for lazy concatenation.
        Parameters:
        message -
